entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.53.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Header: Close dropdown when clicking outside by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2219
  • Make the title optional in the device and scene widgets. by @William-De71 in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2220
  • Scene: Fix tag selection bugs & move order_dir to URL by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2217
  • Chart: Add more units to the list of "when down is positive" by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2221
  • Chart: Increase max value before scientific display to 10e9 by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2222
  • ZWaveJS: New features support : Battery, Illuminance, Binary Sensor, Alarm Sensor by @sescandell in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2198
  • Chart: Close interval dropdown when clicking outside by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2224
  • Scene: Search should check without accents by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2225
  • Scene: When duplicating a scene, prefill the title with "Copy of {{previous name}}" by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2226
  • Integration List: Fix scroll to top bug by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2227
  • Camera: Sort rooms by name in select by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2229
  • Chart: Add last twelve hours interval by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2231
  • System: When vacuum is finished, it should display a message in the UI by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2230
  • Dashboard: When websocket connection is restored, refresh widgets by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2228

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.52.0...v4.53.0

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.54.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Upgrade to Node 22 by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2234
  • Clean old open-zwave integration by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2237
  • ZwaveJS / MQTT : Better handle MQTT reconnection when broker is unavailable by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2236
  • Do not set selector if it already exists by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2243
  • Send reset password link to Telegram or NextCloud talk if configured by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2238
  • feat(z2m): Add power/current/energy variants by @cicoub13 in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2240
  • MQTT : Add better validation errors on create device form by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2244
  • Improve battery low notification by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2245

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.53.0...v4.54.0

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.55.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Dashboard Chart: Fix missing device feature unit when editing a chart by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2246
  • Chat: Enable switch control via user commands by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2247
  • Redirect German users to English documentation by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2249
  • Increase camera image resolution to 1280px by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2248
  • CallMeBot integration for WhatsApp & Signal messages by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2250
  • Scene: Add condition "If... Then... Else..." by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2239

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.54.0...v4.55.0
